contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced stub|auto=yes|date=December 2009}} :''"Rega" redirects here. For other uses, see [[Rega (disambiguation)]].'' {{Infobox River | river_name = Rega | image_name = Rega-hydrografia3.png | caption = Rega Basin | origin = near [[Imienko]] | mouth = [[Baltic Sea]] | basin_countries = [[Poland]] | progression = West then North | length_km = 172 | length = | elevation_m = 177.5 | elevation = | discharge_m3/s = 21.80 | discharge = | watershed_km2 = 2724.9 | watershed = | left_tribs = [[Ukleja]], [[Stara Rega (river)]], [[Reska Węgorza]] | right_tribs = [[Mołstowa]], [[Rekowa]] }} The '''Rega''' is a [[river]] in north-western [[Poland]], flowing into the [[Baltic Sea]]. It is the country's 24th longest river, with a total length of 168 km and a [[drainage basin|catchment area]] of 2,725 km². Towns on the Rega: * [[Świdwin]] * [[Łobez]] * [[Resko]] * [[Płoty]] * [[Gryfice]] * [[Trzebiatów]] ==See also== *[[List of rivers of Poland|List of rivers in Poland]] {{Commons|Rega}} {{Commons category|Rega}} {{Pomerania}} {{coord|54.1462|N|15.2854|E|source:kolossus-dewiki|display=title}} [[Category:Rivers of Poland]] {{Poland-geo-stub}} {{Polish rivers}} {{Link FA|pl}}
